suncertify
Class ApplicationOptions

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.ApplicationOptions

public class ApplicationOptions
extends Object

Class ApplicationOptions provides functionality for the application properties manipulation.
Options of application is stored in properties file. It can be loaded and saved at any moment.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Petr Shilkin

Method Detail

initOptionsManually

public void initOptionsManually()
Initialize options manually.
The method is useful when property file is not available for reading.

                 throws IOException
